desc:
This method starts a Real Time Messaging API session. Refer to the
RTM API documentation for full details on how to use the RTM API.

simple_latest.desc: Return timestamp only for latest message object of each channel (improves performance).

no_unreads.desc: Skip unread counts for each channel (improves performance).

errors.migration_in_progress: Team is being migrated between servers. See the team_migration_started event documentation for details.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
